title: Ticket #5977: Treat multiple DAGs on the command line as unconnected splices?
description:
I'm just thinking in terms of the parsing code here.

I can see at least two advantages:

  • The new ALL_NODES feature work work right with multiple DAGs on the command line.
  • The multiple DAGs case would just be an instance of splices, and we could get rid of the special name-munging code in the parsing code.
creator: wenger
